name: Boss Room: Experiment
description:
"Human, you have one objective, destroy me" - Room Boss

Play as a human in this twisted experiment made for The Indie Tales Jam! Fight against an evil robot in a survival/bullet hell/platformer mix.

This game was made possible because of a great friend of mine, GuiPix, who made all the art! Programming, Design, Sound and Music made by me, Melancholia. Also, thanks a lot for all the community for helping me out when needed!

Hope you're ready to fight the Room Boss!

  • WASD - Up/Left/Down/Right
  • Space - Jump
  • Left Mouse Button - Shoot
  • Stay on the platforms, It will help you a lot
  • Always keep on moving, don't be an easy target
  • Keep. On. Shooting. That's the best tip!
  1. Un-zip the file.
  2. Open RoomBoss.exe
  3. Enjoy!
